backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing access control, task and profile data types, and admin-only APIs for managing assignee–captain pairs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a modal‑size update to the TaskDetailDialog file with metadata, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their purpose, functionality, and roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component with tabbed navigation, theming, error boundaries, and bootstrap-driven user/admin routing.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Login‑required screen prompting unauthenticated users to authenticate via Internet Identity.
Admin dialog for creating tasks with category, status, payment, and automated assignee–captain selection.
frontend/src/components/AppBootstrap.tsx: Initialization wrapper handling identity, actor setup, profile/admin queries, error states, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/AppLoadErrorScre: Displays a user-friendly app load error with reload and optional retry actions.
frontend/src/components/AssigneeDetailsT: Shows and edits an assignee/captain pair with save and delete controls.
frontend/src/components/AssigneeDirector: Manages a directory of assignee/captain pairs with create, edit, delete, bulk upload, and tabbed detail views.
frontend/src/components/BulkUploadSectio: Handles CSV/Excel upload for bulk task creation, including parsing and validation.
frontend/src/components/CategoryManageme: Manages task categories, subcategories, statuses, and payment statuses with creation forms.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and external link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with branding, theme toggle, and user menu including logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that collects name and email and saves the user profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: React error boundary that logs runtime errors and shows a fallback error screen.
frontend/src/components/TaskDetailDialog: Dialog showing task list and dynamic tabs for viewing and editing individual tasks.
frontend/src/components/TaskDetailsTab.t: Tab displaying detailed information about a task with optional admin editing.
frontend/src/components/TaskFormDialog.t: Form dialog for creating or updating tasks with category, status, and assignment fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin checks, tasks, and task filters with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Wraps useActor with timeout, error tracking, and refetch logic to ensure reliable actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useTaskDetailTabs.ts: Manages task detail tabs, including opening, closing, updating, and resetting active tabs.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes using CSS custom properties.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders admin panel tabs for bulk upload, category settings, and assignee directory management.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays task analytics dashboards and supports filtering tasks by category, status, and payment status.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Shows a searchable, filterable task table with CRUD actions and multi‑tab task detail management.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Generates CSV templates and parses assignee/captain CSV files with validation and error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/diagnostics.ts: Provides safe logging utilities that redact sensitive data and report initialization or runtime errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash-route support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, requirements, known issues, and planned features for task assignment without user accounts.
